article_title: The White House Is Bribing Health Insurance Companies

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: By TIM PHILLIPS: The White House recently adopted a new approach for updating Americans on the country’s most consequential law. I call it the “needle in a haystack” method: Bury the announcement in hundreds of pages of regulations and hope no one finds it.
og.title: The White House Is Bribing Health Insurance Companies
